translations: n．重新发行：指将已经发行过的书籍、音乐、电影等再次发行，通常是因为原版已经售罄或者有新的修订版。

phrs.translation: 再颁程序, 动词第三人称单数

sentences.sentence: These reissues will have new ISBNs, distinctive jackets and strong branding.
sentences.translation: 这些再版将有新的ISBN，独特的夹克和强大的品牌。

sentences.sentence: Complete a 3d puzzle and hear tracks from the "Ten" reissues. Each row unlocks a song, the whole puzzle a video.
sentences.translation: 完成一个三维拼图和听到的“十大”再版曲目。每行解锁歌曲，整个拼图的视频。

sentences.sentence: Last year's bestselling new vinyl album was "the Suburbs" by Arcade Fire. Most of the other records sold are reissues of classic albums.
sentences.translation: 去年最畅销的新唱片专辑是拱廊之火(Arcade Fire)乐团的《郊外》，销售的大部分其他唱片则是古典专辑的再版物。
